name: Snappy Word: Jellyfish Horizon
description:
Dive as deep as you can in this single-button-controlled nightmare! On your way to the ocean’s unexplored depths you might find helpful items such as air bubbles, scuba tanks, and even swimfins. But beware of the jellyfish who might not be keen on letting you float freely into their domain.

Controls:

  • Space to dive
  • Enter to restart

Power-ups:

  • Bubbles will restore your air supply
  • Scuba tanks will let you breathe for longer
  • Swimfins will let you hold space to dive continuously, and also double as armor in that they can take hits for you (but will be consumed in the process). They are also stackable! Try it!
